com.mobixell.xtt
Class FunctionModule_DNS

java.lang.Object
  com.mobixell.xtt.FunctionModule
      com.mobixell.xtt.FunctionModule_DNS
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Object>
public class FunctionModule_DNS
extends FunctionModule

FunctionModule_DNS.

Returns an IP for A or AAAA requests, first checking the internal XTT DNS name store, then doing a lookup via the Java interface to the local machines DNS servers.

Domain names can be resolved to any IP4 or IP6 address.
To configure the entries the XTT configuration must contain a node like: 

<DNSServer>
     <StartOnLoad/>
     <entry>
         <name>xtt724.com</name>
         <!--ip>192.168.1.1</ip-->
     </entry>
     <entry>
         ...
     </entry>
 </DNSServer>

Additional domains are added by specifying new entry nodes (the ip address being optional, where SYSTEM/IP is taken from the configuration otherwise).

Version:
$Revision: 1.20 $
Author:
Gavin Cattell

initialize

public void initialize()
Description copied from class: FunctionModule
Re-Initialize the Module

addEntry

public void addEntry(String[] parameters)
Adds an entry to the internal name table.

Parameters:
parameters - array of String containing the parameters.
parameters[0] argument is always the method name,
parameters[1] is the domain name.
parameters[2] [optional] is the IP to resolve to, if not specified SYSTEM/IP is taken from the configuration.
If null is used as parameters it sends the allowed parameters list

removeEntry

public void removeEntry(String[] parameters)
Remove an entry from the internal name table.

Parameters:
parameters - array of String containing the parameters.
parameters[0] argument is always the method name,
parameters[1] is the domain name to remove.
If null is used as parameters it sends the allowed parameters list

public void startDNSServer(String[] parameters)
Starts a DNS Server.

Parameters:
parameters - array of String containing the parameters.
parameters[0] argument is always the method name,
No arguments are possible for this function.
If null is used as parameters it sends the allowed parameters list

public boolean stopDNSServer(String[] parameters)

Parameters:
parameters - array of String containing the parameters.
parameters[0] argument is always the method name,
No arguments are possible for this function.
If null is used as parameters it sends the allowed parameters list

Description copied from class: FunctionModule
Check the resources needed by the FunctionModule. A null return means ok.

setResponseDelay

public void setResponseDelay(String[] parameters)
Set a delay for the DNS before sending the response. Set it to 0 or less for no delay.

Parameters:
parameters - array of String containing the parameters. parameters[0] argument is always the method name, parameters[1] argument is delay time in miliseconds, If null is used as parameters it sends the allowed parameters list to the XTTProperties.printFail(java.lang.String) method and returns.
See Also:
MMSDecoder
